title: Rocketmen:Axis of Evil
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-4, Local Multiplayer 1-4, HD (High Definition). Join Rocketmen Nick Sion, Alec Mink and the Alliance of Free Planets in their white-knuckled struggle to free the solar system from the tyrannical grip of the Legion of Terra in this RPG styled shooter. Players have the choice to save the galaxy alone or cooperatively with up to three other players over Xbox LIVE or locally on the same console. With its distinctive cel-shaded art style, engaging storyline, customizable characters and RPG elements, this shooter will keep players coming back for more. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.

contentRating.label: E10 (Everyone 10+)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Rocketmen:AOE–It Came From Uranus Expansion Pack
childDownloads.description: Saturn is in the clutches of the Legion of Terra and it’s up to YOU to stop them! Continue the story with your original saved characters. New powerful guns and secondary weapons! Explore the planet Saturn in three glorious levels. Buy the exciting new expansion for the Rocketmen universe! (Purchase of Rocketmen: Axis of Evil is required to play the expansion pack) There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
